tests.input: Tokyo, the largest city and capital of Japan, is located on the eastern coast of Honshu, the largest of the four main islands of the Japanese archipelago.

tests.llm_output: Tokyo, kota terbesar dan ibu kota Jepang, terletak di pesisir timur Honshu, pulau terbesar dari empat pulau utama di kepulauan Jepang.
